messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new confluence space confluence hello confluence attached files let needed senior consultant

message.reasoning:

I'm focusing on identifying keywords to determine the most fitting classification.

I'm currently refining my categorization of the IT ticket "new confluence space confluence hello confluence attached files let needed senior consultant."
